articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Expresses Sympathy to Vietnamese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Expresses Sympathy to Vietnamese President
						
 Pyongyang, November 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of sympathy to Vietnamese President Truong Tan Sang as regards typhoon that hit Vietnam, causing human and material losses.
					 He extended deep sympathy and condolences to the victims and bereaved families, expressing conviction that the Vietnamese government would eradicate the aftereffects of the natural disaster as early as possible and put the life of the inhabitants in the afflicted areas on a normal basis.
